actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy Regulation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Regulation and Conservation

official_title: A bill to prohibit the construction of a proposed natural gas pipeline in the Wasatch Variation Corridor, and to encourage the re-location of such pipeline in remote, less populated areas (National Forest Lands or otherwise) of Utah.

summary.text: Prohibits the use of the Wasatch Variation Corridor (Utah) for a proposed natural gas pipeline originating in Wyoming and terminating in California.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the construction of a proposed natural gas pipeline in the Wasatch Variation Corridor, and to encourage the re-location of such pipeline in remote, less populated areas (National Forest Lands or otherwise) of Utah.
